Help to Improve Conditions at Bodhichitta Land

UPDATE: All funds have now been collected. There were many generous and a total of £3,362 (around €3,700) has been raised!

We are very grateful to all who have donated and will continue to post updates on the GoFundMe page.

A friend of Nalanda Monestary in France is currently helping to raise funds to improve conditions in Bodhichitta Land, a solitary retreat cabin located deep in the French Pyrenees.
